name: Abaji
description: Abaji is a Local Government Area in the Federal Capital Territory of Nigeria. It is situated in the southwestern part of the FCT and is known for its agricultural activities.

name: Bwari
description: Bwari is one of the Area Councils in the Federal Capital Territory. It is located in the northern part of the FCT and is known for its proximity to the University of Abuja and the Zuma Rock.

name: Gwagwalada
description: Gwagwalada is an Area Council in the Federal Capital Territory. It is home to the University of Abuja Teaching Hospital and is known for its diverse communities and cultural heritage.

name: Kuje
description: Kuje is a Local Government Area in the Federal Capital Territory. It is situated to the southwest of Abuja city and is known for its agricultural activities and traditional festivals.

name: Kwali
description: Kwali is an Area Council in the Federal Capital Territory. It is located to the southeast of Abuja city and is known for its rich history, craft market, and pottery traditions.

name: Municipal Area Council
description: The Abuja Municipal Area Council (AMAC) is one of the Area Councils in the FCT. It covers the central parts of Abuja city and serves as the administrative center of the FCT.
